name: sailing-curriculum
description: Complete RYA/ASA YachtMaster Offshore navigation curriculum with 15 specialized agents including intelligent master coordinator

plugins.name: navigation-master
plugins.description: Master coordinator - intelligent routing to specialized agents and multi-plugin workflow orchestration

plugins.name: chart-basics
plugins.description: Chart datum, symbols, Mercator projection, compass errors, variation & deviation - 17 skills

plugins.name: tides
plugins.description: Tidal calculations, heights, streams, secondary ports, diamonds - 8 skills

plugins.name: positioning
plugins.description: Visual fixes, EP, DR, running fixes, cross-track error, navigation web - 8 skills

plugins.name: course-to-steer
plugins.description: CTS calculations, leeway application, velocity triangles, tidal streams - 7 skills

plugins.name: electronic-navigation
plugins.description: GPS/GNSS, radar, AIS, instruments, MARPA, radar pilotage - 16 skills

plugins.name: ec-plotting
plugins.description: Electronic charts, chart plotters, RNC vs ENC, waypoint management - 5 skills

plugins.name: passage-making
plugins.description: Passage planning, pre-departure prep, safety briefing, leeway, SOLAS V compliance - 5 skills

plugins.name: visual-aids
plugins.description: IALA buoyage, cardinal marks, lights, ranges, dipping distance - 11 skills

plugins.name: pilotage
plugins.description: Harbor entry, leading lines, clearing bearings, restricted visibility, integrated pilotage - 13 skills

plugins.name: meteorology
plugins.description: Weather systems, forecasts, clouds, fog, pressure patterns, Buys Ballot's Law - 6 skills

plugins.name: irpcs
plugins.description: Complete COLREGS Rules 1-37, vessel hierarchy, collision avoidance, lights, shapes, signals - 7 skills

plugins.name: safety-environment
plugins.description: Emergency procedures, EPIRB/PLB, distress communications, life jackets, fog navigation - 7 skills

plugins.name: collision-regs
plugins.description: Collision scenario analysis and right-of-way determination (skeleton)

plugins.name: nav-lights-flip
plugins.description: Navigation lights, day shapes, sound signals rapid-fire quiz system - 3 skills
